short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter out specific domains from Google search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Real Recipe Find is a Chrome extension designed to help you discover tested, authentic, home-cooked recipes filtered from Google Search results. It eliminates the noise of large publications, forums like Reddit and Quora, and AI-generated content.
Key features:
•	Independent recipe sources: Search on independent publisher websites.
•	AI-free results: No more AI-generated recipes that have never been tested.
•	Customizable results: Easily select which large publications to exclude or include.
•	Simple to use: Intuitive interface for effortless recipe searching.
Install Real Recipe Find today and start exploring a world of authentic, delicious recipes that have been proven to work!
